channel.title: Speedify now supports OpenWrt officially
channel.description: Routers now require a [license](https://speedify.com/store/#routers). [Installation proccess](https://support.speedify.com/article/918-openwrt) requires knowledge with OpenWrt. Performance should be better than SmoothWAN and the [unofficial installer](https://smoothwan.discourse.group/t/installing-speedify-on-any-openwrt-capable-router-unofficially/119).

item.title: Speedify now supports OpenWrt officially
